title_advert: ['Corner 5BR on 1 of the Biggest Plots in Amalfi!']
descriptions:
['DescriptionThis corner 5-bedroom property sits on one of the biggest plots of the project, with a grand rooftop terrace for full views of the Arabian Gulf and Dubai City Skyline. 
Part of an exclusive collection of beachside homes that completely sold out within 24 hours of launching!
Villa Amalfi is the best priced community on the island, offering the same luxury and benefits as other projects launched by Meraas in Jumeira Bay. A key feature of this beautiful development is G+2+Roof Terrace homes that offer full views of the Arabian Gulf and the famed Dubai city skyline.
This property is one of 68 ultra-luxury beachside homes clustered around a 14,000 sqm lush, green park designed as an extended garden accessible only to residents. Located at the centre of Jumeirah Bay with direct access from Jumeirah Beach Road. 
Your home features 2 separate living areas, with one on the ground floor and another, more intimate family room on the second floor. The grand master suite takes up the majority of the second floor with a private balcony overlooking your private garden. With an elevator moving you from floor to floor of your magnificent property.
A premium choice for a premium buyer:
* Premium address
* Adjacent to the beach
* Full sea & skyline views
* Direct access to Bulgari Resort, Spa, Yacht Club & Marina
* Extremely low supply: 68 in total
* Credible developer: Meraas is well-known for its signature living concepts
* Upscale facilities & amenities
* Direct access from Jumeirah Beach Road
* Buy to live and to invest in the best
Connect with me to view this property complete with stunning views, impeccable design, expansive layout and excellent location on a private island resort shared with the world-class Bulgari Resort & Residences development.
fäm Properties

descriptions:
['DescriptionKnight Frank is proud to offer you this unique, customized, fully furnished home .
This beautifully designed and high quality villa is part of the exclusive and award winning Royal Residences at the Jumeirah Zabeel Saray on the unique Palm Jumeirah.
Upon entering you are welcomed by a high ceiling lobby after which you will find a spacious Guest Room. Living and dining room are facing the sea. Along with this Ground floor has fully Modern Kitchen & Maids Room.
The first floor accessible by stairs or elevator consists of 4 bedrooms, all with unique interiors, walk-in closets, full sized baths, and showers. Master Bed Room is facing the Sea and an additional sitting area is attached with Master Bedroom along with a small pantry. Master Bath comes with Jacuzzi.
The swimming pool and gardens have fabulous views to The Dubai. 
The villa benefits from all the services of the 5 star Zabeel Saray Hotel.
For a private viewing please call.']

["DescriptionGulf Sotheby's International Realty is pleased to offer you this A-type, Acacia 6 bedroom villa. This beautiful home is set on a plot of 16400 sq ft.
The Acacia is the largest of the original Barari villa's. This home is in immaculate condition and is ready to move into,

Tucked away in the service area you will find a service kitchen, as well as a laundry room. The two basements are ideal as a  cinema or games room and have an adjoining shower room. The villa has a large roof terrace which is perfect for entertaining and admiring the Dubai skyline view. The garage offers space for 3 cars, with additional outside parking.
Al Barari is a secluded paradise that will offer a unique living experience in Dubai. This lavish villa is perfect for the discerning clients looking to combine elegant living spaces with idyllic views.
Contact Gulf Sothebys International Realty today for your private viewing of this extraordinary property."]
